events.name: onToolbarClick
events.description: Fires when the user clicks the secondary mouse button anywhere on the toolbar in the main window.

parameters.name: toolbarId
parameters.description: The ID of the toolbar the user clicked.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: The X position of the mouse when the user clicked.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: The Y position of the mouse when the user clicked.
